text: Ian McCahon Sinclair (born 10 June 1929) is an Australian politician. H was leader of the National Party from 1984 to 1989. He was a government minister under six different prime ministers. He was the Speaker of the House of Representatives from March to November 1998. Sinclair was born in Sydney, New South Wales. In January 2001, he was appointed a Companion of the Order of Australia (AC). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Australian House of Representatives Category:Politicians from Sydney
title: Ian Sinclair
